column4: does anyone know of any good Aero/Win7 copy cat themes/skins and such so i could add some "familiarty" to Ubuntu if i made the full switch... i havent found many articles on customizing Ubuntu a lot
there is a transform pack to make the OS look like Win7 if you wish

32bit gives a slightly smoother ride due to some companies only supporting 32bit, If you have acres of RAM then use 64bit. You can use 32bit + PAE kernel but each process will only see 3.2Gb but all your RAM will be useable by the OS
